title: Ranked 5s
body: Does anyone know what has happened to ranked 5s? There is no option on the client to play ranked teams. Only dynamic Que and Normals.

replies.body:
Due to some shortfalls with Ranked 5s, namely a small pool of players according to Lyte, there won't be Ranked 5s this season in favor of further supporting Dynamic Queue. For more information, read the statement and post below:

>Because Dynamic Ranked is an indisputably better experience for playing with friends, the Ranked Teams queue skips the 2016 season while we begin work to integrate the full team experience into Dynamic Ranked.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/HGblb9fH-the-2016-ranked-season-updates-on-dynamic-ranked-and-your-feedback
